content: {"name": "South Yadkin Baptist Association", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Anyone who needs help may request an appointment by calling Jaime Tang at 704-873-4372, ext. 3.\n1431 Front Street, Statesville \u2013 Open by Appointment", "email": "", "url": "https://sybaptist.org/2019/09/22/food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3009 Amity Hill Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Statesville", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28677", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.7209593, "longitude": -80.852766}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 873-4372", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
